subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn added to her impressive season, winning the World Cup super-G title for her 16th career crystal globe by finishing sixth in the final race in the discipline this year in Schladming, Austria.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn added to her impressive season, winning the World Cup super-G title for her 16th career crystal globe by finishing sixth in the final race in the discipline this year in Schladming, Austria.
